page.title: 17THE MAYOR OF RAMSGATE
page.content: Councillor Richard Taylor is serving his second term as Mayor.His Deputy is Cllr.Easton and the Mayoress is Mrs. Nora Taylor.Cllr.Taylor has been a town Cllr. since 1972 and at present serves on 2 committees.Born in Chelsea over 70 years ago,he came to Ramsgate at the age of 6,living here ever since apart from time at university and being an officer in wartime Fighter Command.He taught in local schools for 40 years. He serves on many local committees such as RSPCA,Lifeboat and League of Friends and is a Governor of 4 schools.His chain of office was presented to the town by Sir Moses Montefiore.He has to attend many functions locally,and is often invited to Ramsgate's twin town of Conflans near Paris.He sees the harbour and new port complex as the keys to Ramsgate's future.
